title: AVE5
author: AVE5
content: If you all could remember an exciting thread I made here sometimes ago via my how appreciative I was with my holding despites my challenges  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5486712.msg63723593#msg63723593.I've come to let you all know that I'm doing so well and believe me, I may regret why I didn't embrace this development earlier on but yet I'm not late to it because I'm doing so well with it grateful potentials right now.I'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?Me, firstly I'll secure my capital, withdraw 90% of my interests, reserve 45% for DCA to accumulate more bitcoin during the Dip, 10% to boost my alternative source of income and will have 25% to solve my needs and then I'll have the remaining 10% to execute a water project for community services because in my area, the poor masses surfers a lot to get reach to water and in life, water seems to be life of its own and I feel a lot of pity for the poor masses that can't even afford to get water freely as common and essential as it could be,                                     image hosting                                      image hosting                                                                         image hostingI saw this project somewhere in town which inspired my goodwill thought to help the community.Meanwhile I didn't make any promises to the community but indebted to myself, I'll do it without a damn promises.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?I will convert it to fiat and some to stable coins, wait for bear market to last and and invest back after a significant bear market. I will use the money I receive elsewhere for other things. But later I may prefer to use my bitcoin money to start a business but that has not come to my mind than to sell and buy back after massive bear market and make my children to inherit it.

comments.author: Cointxz
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?Re-invest again on Bitcoin and other altcoins. I have business that gave me profit sufficient to sustain my daily expenses and cover all other fix expenses such as monthly bills from insurance, water, electricity and so on. All my crypto holdings is just for my investment venture outside my business.I established my business through taking profit on previous bull run. I mention this because some newbie might be inspired of having their own business using crypto profit and use the profit later on for crypto investment instead of investing purely on Bitcoin without any consistent source of income aside from your job. Right now, I’m employed on my own business which gives me a lot of freedom to do what I like while still invested on Bitcoin.

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?After this Bull Run, I will make sure I take all my profits by converting them into stable coins first; I will then further convert the ones I need for my personal use and other physical investment into fiat currency, then leave the remaining one in stable coin and wait for another dip.I will still buy back my bitcoin after the Bull run because I am sure it will take me to another level of financial freedom, and I will prefer holding bitcoin to stable centralized coins in any exchange.Meanwhile, I will know how to minimize my ways of spending for security reasons because there are haters out there that didn’t know how you earn your money but they will be after your success

comments.author: MusaMohamed
comments.body: Quote from: Abu-Naim on March 11, 2024, 01:07:12 PMAfter this Bull Run, I will make sure I take all my profits by converting them into stable coins first; I will then further convert the ones I need for my personal use and other physical investment into fiat currency, then leave the remaining one in stable coin and wait for another dip.When you take profit, you can choose to convert it to stable coins or fiat currency but stable coins have some risk.First risk is, it can be frozen in your wallet.PSA: Most Stablecoins Can Be Frozen, Even in Your Own WalletsSecond risk is it can be depegged. With fiat currency, it does not degeg to itself.If you worry about decreasing purchasing power of your national fiat currency, take profit and convert it to US. dollar.

comments.author: rodskee
comments.body: Have sold 50% today as I think 72k is enough for me to take profit , now I have saved 20% to re buy once the price drops again so I can re enter , the 10% will be for our summer escapade because I owe my family a treat , the other 20% will be for emergency funds because my father is having this sickness that need complete medical attention.And OP it is a good heart of yours to provide for the community , hope that tank will lastfor long.keep it up.

comments.author: Alphakilo
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?I am not going to lie and say I have any plan in mind after the bull run. Right now, I am keeping an open mind and remaining fluid. I honestly do not have a meticulously crafted plan for what lies beyond this bull run. Instead, I have chosen to be patient and watch how the events unfold without jumping into any premature planning. I know that there are opportunities that may arise in the future as a result of the bull run, therefore, I am taking this time to position and adapt myself to seize them when they arise.

comments.author: headingnorth
comments.body: Have been buying heavily and holding BTC since two years ago and now in profit many times over. I won't start selling until after the halving and then only a small amount at a time maybe 10%.

comments.author: AVE5
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on March 11, 2024, 11:36:53 AMQuote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?I will convert it to fiat and some to stable coins, wait for bear market to last and and invest back after a significant bear market. I will use the money I receive elsewhere for other things. But later I may prefer to use my bitcoin money to start a business but that has not come to my mind than to sell and buy back after massive bear market and make my children to inherit it.@Oshosondy you're such a generous and amiable invertor. In fact, let me just address you to be a responsible man who foresees the future and plans not only ahead of it but considering the welfares of his generation to come.That's a long term goal investor speaking in you but this is only possible to come through when you've enough of side hustles to provide your daily life needs and also your ability to be concious on your financial expenditures.I also hope you'd breed your children up so that they follows yours ways maybe do better than you do. Indeed I love your diplomatic investment scheme. All the best to us all who thinks responsibly with the fear of downfalls against the future.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: Take some profits and do freely what you think will satisfy you. Like the majority, I'd sell some into stable coins and will wait for the dip again, but I guess that dip is going to be big where I can accumulate back those sold BTCs that I do. That's the cycle that many are doing and even the big institutions that have joined the market, they've got their own prices to sell and that's why if you're going to miss the time of selling, it's okay but you have to wait again for a couple of years to see the bull run again.What I just like this time is it seems that we've been gone through the years so fast. And it's like that the 2021 bull run was just yesterday.

comments.author: GideonGono
comments.body: Quote from: Oshosondy on March 11, 2024, 11:36:53 AMQuote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?I will convert it to fiat and some to stable coins, wait for bear market to last and and invest back after a significant bear market. I will use the money I receive elsewhere for other things. But later I may prefer to use my bitcoin money to start a business but that has not come to my mind than to sell and buy back after massive bear market and make my children to inherit it.I would also convert them into stable coin like USDT and wait for the price to fall down, I don't want to start a business since I am already busy with my work and other things, also I don't have a place and idea on what business to start even if I have a capital to start one.I wouldn't take any from my investment or profit I would just reinvest it all in crypto again, since is still not enough to buy what I need so I would just continue to trade and accumulate more.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: One thing i couldnt picture out from this thread is wether youre proposoing on embarking a project like this after the bullrun in which i believe should be something around next year project after which we might have experienced the highest of it all in bitcoin market price, but if the little weve got right from the start of this year bullrun is what you used in making this community project then i must applaud you for doing that and on the other side, you would have also used the fund to reinvest on bitcoin and hodl more till after the bullrun is complete.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: I will take and convert some into fiat meanwhile the others will be used to re-invest again. A bear market is the best time to buy coins so I will most likely take advantage of that. To be honest, I have not really thought of what I would do with my profits. How will I spend it? I honestly have no idea.Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMthen I'll have the remaining 10% to execute a water project for community services because in my area, the poor masses surfers a lot to get reach to water and in life, water seems to be life of its own and I feel a lot of pity for the poor masses that can't even afford to get water freely as common and essential as it could be,                              Such a nice gesture! This has inspired me to think of what program I can do someday to help those in need in my community. Bless your kind heart!

comments.author: Iranus
comments.body: Quote from: btc78 on March 15, 2024, 01:12:43 PMI will take and convert some into fiat meanwhile the others will be used to re-invest again. A bear market is the best time to buy coins so I will most likely take advantage of that. To be honest, I have not really thought of what I would do with my profits. How will I spend it? I honestly have no idea.Are you sure about what you are saying? So what is your investment purpose and what motivates you to invest in bitcoin and want to make profits? This is the first time I've heard someone say that they don't know what to do with the money they earn while struggling to make money every day  . Furthermore, you don't have a family, don't you have daily needs?Profit and money are still things we pursue every day and sometimes take risks to get it. Therefore, it is meaningless to say that we do not have a purpose after achieving it.

comments.author: ancafe
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN? If the current price is the momentum that is being waited for then I will sell then wait for a slight decline to re-accumulate purchases. I think most people do that when the price of Bitcoin exceeds its highest price because this is the moment they have been waiting for. Save the profits you earn before accumulating buybacks and I will not change profits on altcoins because I don't think it's appropriate.The plan you have implemented is good and quite useful for people, especially in the area where you live, there are many poor people. But one thing you have to remember is that you don't need to invest all the money you have because we need spare money for other needs. The percentage you made is good and I hope you are consistent with the planning you have implemented.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: Iranus on March 15, 2024, 02:31:46 PMAre you sure about what you are saying? So what is your investment purpose and what motivates you to invest in bitcoin and want to make profits? This is the first time I've heard someone say that they don't know what to do with the money they earn while struggling to make money every day  . Furthermore, you don't have a family, don't you have daily needs?Profit and money are still things we pursue every day and sometimes take risks to get it. Therefore, it is meaningless to say that we do not have a purpose after achieving it.Come on, he's a multi billionaire, his big business and investments already enough to feed his whole big family, that's why he don't know what should he spend anymore. It's true he's participating a campaign, but it's just for fun, he don't really care about how much he gets paid and the pay rate is.I believe his purpose to invest in Bitcoin is for fun.

comments.author: decodx
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI saw this project somewhere in town which inspired my goodwill thought to help the community.Meanwhile I didn't make any promises to the community but indebted to myself, I'll do it without a damn promises.That's a really interesting idea, wanting to give back to your community with that water project.  Having goals beyond just money, like helping people out, is great and the main thing is having a plan that you feel good about.  Have you thought about talking to some other folks in your community about that project? There might be other people concerned too who could help get it going or provide logistics or something.  Just a random thought!  Well, best of luck with your community project and everything.  Sounds like your heart's in the right place.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Nothing unique but rather the same plan which every experienced users have which is withdrawing a part of profit and having the remaining in stable coin so that I can buyback Bitcoin during the bearish season and hodl it till the next bullrun, simultaneously I will continue with my current DCA contribution. Appreciate your plan of helping needy and giving it back to the community as water is basic necessities and everyone deserves it.

comments.author: letteredhub
comments.body: Quote from: AVE5 on March 11, 2024, 11:07:56 AMI'm just here to ask you all especially those who are newly investors to this bitcoin investment platform like me that WHAT WOULD YOU DO WITH YOUR FIRST INVESTED FUNDS AFTER THE BULL RUN?Every individual will have a different perspective about this question but generally the whole idea of investing in any project or asset is to make and take profit. The bullrun circle is a season where all bitcoin investors look forward to take profit from their long time holding, therefore it's no wrong if we sell a part of our funds we have made as profit to use for other physical on-land investments while we can still continue with our DCAing towards another circle. Our Investment plans and projections differs and so it's our time of taken profit too.

comments.author: boyptc
comments.body: Everyone has the same plans as we invest in Bitcoin. We buy BTC, hold and then sell if you need that in fiat. But what I can say is that the majority of us don't have plans yet and we don't know what to do if we ever get into that point of our lives that we've been in crazy profit. Those that don't have plans yet, they'd just wait because this is a long game and you'll definitely change your life upon looking at that point of your life when you held Bitcoin while the others don't.
